description.raw:
This PR turns on ROS topic statistics and runs a node that logs its output to `~/.ros/rostopic_stats_logger.log`:

[http://wiki.ros.org/Topics#Topic\_statistics](http://wiki.ros.org/Topics#Topic_statistics)

Example output:

```
---
topic: "/X1/pose"
node_pub: "/X1/ros_ign_bridge_pose"
node_sub: "/X1/pose_tf_broadcaster"
window_start: 
  secs: 8
  nsecs:  52000000
window_stop: 
  secs: 18
  nsecs: 512000000
delivered_msgs: 19499
dropped_msgs: 10
traffic: 1932310
period_mean: 
  secs: 0
  nsecs:    536465
period_stddev: 
  secs: 0
  nsecs:  31457921
period_max: 
  secs: 4
  nsecs: 352000000
stamp_age_mean: 
  secs: -1
  nsecs: 595962665
stamp_age_stddev: 
  secs: 0
  nsecs: 713605161
stamp_age_max: 
  secs: 1
  nsecs: 756000000
---
```

The `dropped_msgs` field could be useful. So far in my local testing, I have not seen dropped msgs for sensor topics yet but I do see many dropped msgs for the `/pose` \(consumed by `tf_broadcaster`\) and `/cmd_vel` topics
description.html:
This PR turns on ROS topic statistics and runs a node that logs its output to ~/.ros/rostopic_stats_logger.log:

http://wiki.ros.org/Topics#Topic_statistics

Example output:

---
topic: "/X1/pose"
node_pub: "/X1/ros_ign_bridge_pose"
node_sub: "/X1/pose_tf_broadcaster"
window_start: 
  secs: 8
  nsecs:  52000000
window_stop: 
  secs: 18
  nsecs: 512000000
delivered_msgs: 19499
dropped_msgs: 10
traffic: 1932310
period_mean: 
  secs: 0
  nsecs:    536465
period_stddev: 
  secs: 0
  nsecs:  31457921
period_max: 
  secs: 4
  nsecs: 352000000
stamp_age_mean: 
  secs: -1
  nsecs: 595962665
stamp_age_stddev: 
  secs: 0
  nsecs: 713605161
stamp_age_max: 
  secs: 1
  nsecs: 756000000
---

The dropped_msgs field could be useful. So far in my local testing, I have not seen dropped msgs for sensor topics yet but I do see many dropped msgs for the /pose (consumed by tf_broadcaster) and /cmd_vel topics
